content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/crab-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ this unique crab crochet pattern is crafted in separate panels worked flat and then joined together the pattern is written in us crochet terminology the finished measurements are approximately 10cm/4 tall and 16cm/6 5 wide the pattern is worked in worsted weight yarn and a 3 25mm hook but it can be worked in any weight yarn to make it bigger or smaller as desired
